changeStatus(String, String) - Method in class cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.controller.OrderController
Use "/changeStatus/" followed by the orderId and new status on putMapping to find an order by it's ID and change it's completionStatus to match status, returns null if the ID is not valid.
changeStatus(String, String) - Method in interface cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services.OrderService
 
changeStatus(String, String) - Method in class cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services.OrderServiceImpl
Finds an order by it's ID and changes it's completionStatus to match newStatus, returns null if the ID is not valid.
changeStatusTest() - Method in class cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.controller.OrderTest
 
changeWaiter(String, String) - Method in class cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.controller.OrderController
Use "/changeWaiter/" followed by the OrderId and new waiter on putMapping to find an order by it's ID and change it's waiterName field to match newWaiter, returns null if the ID is not valid.
changeWaiterName(String, String) - Method in interface cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services.OrderService
 
changeWaiterName(String, String) - Method in class cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services.OrderServiceImpl
Changes the waiterName field of the order with the corresponding id to whatever is provided as newWaiterName.
changeWaiterTest() - Method in class cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.controller.OrderTest

Indicates that an annotated class is a "Controller" (e.g.
cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.models - package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.models
Models Component are the class files which contain the @Entity annotation representing data that can be persisted to the database.
cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.repository - package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.repository
Repository Component are the class files which contain the @Repository annotation these repositories have interfaces that extend Spring Data JPA JpaRepository to interact with PostgreSQL Database.
cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.security - package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.security
The security package contains Spring security configurations and security objects of which are implemented in the Service package.
cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.security.request - package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.security.request
Request package contains Payload classes which specifies the format of the request body to be taken as parameter for functions in UserAuthController.
cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.security.response - package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.security.response
Response package contains a Payload class which specifies the format of the Json file to be returned as a response entity in the login function located in UserAuthController.
cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services - package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services
Service Components are the class file which contains @Service annotation.
